rio:start-all

Full name:

org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-rio-plugin:4.2:start-all

Description:

Starts a Cybernode and a Provision Monitor

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
environment Map - The environment configuration Map.
overrides String - Provide an override
timeout long - The timeout for deployment/undeployment.

Parameter Details

environment:

The environment configuration Map.
  • Type: java.util.Map
  • Required: No

overrides:

Provide an override
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

timeout:

The timeout for deployment/undeployment.
  • Type: long
  • Required: No
